query.statement:
SELECT '' CHK, '' FLAG, A.TEM || '-' || A.RDT || '-' || A.SEQ ETN, A.SIR SIR, MAX(A.ARA) ARA, MAX(A.ARA_NM) ARA_NM, MAX(A.VKGRP) TEM, MAX(A.VKGRP_NM) TEM_NM, MAX(A.GBU_NM) GBU_NM, MAX(A.BSU) BSU, MAX(A.BSU_NM) BSU_NM, MAX(A.UPN) UPN, MAX(A.PJT) PJT, COUNT(*) CNT, MAX(A.SPT) SPT, MAX(A.NAM) NAM, MAX(A.SPC) SPC, MAX(A.TYN) TYN, MAX(A.CDT) CDT, SUM(A.FMT) FMT, SUM(A.PMT) PMT, SUM(A.HMT) HMT, SUM(A.DMT) DMT, (SUM(A.FMT) + SUM(A.PMT)) / COUNT(*) AVR, MAX(A.PST) PST, MAX(A.PST_NM) PST_NM, MAX(A.MDT) MDT, MAX(A.MID_NM) MID_NM, MAX(A.DUPLIC) DUPLIC, SUM(A.FFG) FFG, SUM(A.FHG) FHG, MAX(A.RAT) RAT, MAX(A.RA2) RA2, MAX(A.DOC) DOC, MAX(A.APSTAT) APSTAT, MAX(A.APSTAT_NM) APSTAT_NM, MAX(A.FRT) FRT, MAX(A.CPD) CPD FROM ( SELECT '' CHK, '' FLAG, A.CS301_TEM || '-' || A.CS301_RDT || '-' || A.CS301_SEQ ETN, A.CS301_TEM TEM, A.CS301_RDT RDT, A.CS301_SEQ SEQ, A.CS301_SIR SIR, C.BSU_ARA ARA, D.CTEXT2 ARA_NM, C.VKGRP VKGRP, E.CTEXT2 VKGRP_NM, CASE F.GBU WHEN '1' THEN '직영' WHEN '3' THEN '협력사' ELSE '' END GBU_NM, A.CS301_BSU BSU, C.ABR_NM BSU_NM, B.CS302_UPN UPN, B.CS302_PJT PJT, B.CS302_HNO HNO, A.CS301_SPT SPT, A.CS301_NAM NAM, A.CS301_SPC SPC, B.CS302_TYN TYN, A.CS301_CDT CDT, B.CS302_FMT FMT, B.CS302_PMT PMT, B.CS302_HMT HMT, B.CS302_DMT DMT, A.CS301_PST PST, CASE A.CS301_PST WHEN 'A1' THEN '작성' WHEN 'A2' THEN '반송' WHEN 'A3' THEN '전송' WHEN 'A6' THEN '승인' END PST_NM, A.CS301_MDT MDT, ( SELECT USERNAME FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND USERNUMB = A.CS301_MID ) MID_NM, ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END FROM SAPHEE.ZCST301 N, SAPHEE.ZCST302 M WHERE N.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND N.MANDT = M.MANDT AND N.CS301_TEM = M.CS302_TEM AND N.CS301_RDT = M.CS302_RDT AND N.CS301_SEQ = M.CS302_SEQ AND N.CS301_SIR = M.CS302_SIR AND N.CS301_DEL = 'N' AND M.CS302_PJT = B.CS302_PJT AND M.CS302_HNO = B.CS302_HNO ) DUPLIC, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS126_PJT = B.CS302_PJT AND CS126_HNO = B.CS302_HNO AND CS126_FFG = 'Y' ) FFG, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS126_PJT = B.CS302_PJT AND CS126_HNO = B.CS302_HNO AND CS126_FHG = 'Y' ) FHG, VALUE(G.CS654_RAT,0) RAT, VALUE(G.CS654_RA2,0) RA2, A.CS301_DOC DOC, VALUE(H.APSTAT,'') APSTAT, (SELECT L.DTEXT1 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE L WHERE L.MANDT = A.MANDT AND L.LANG = 'ko' AND L.CODE1 = 'WBAP_STAT' AND L.CODE2 = VALUE(H.APSTAT,'')) APSTAT_NM, CASE WHEN A.CS301_FRT = '' THEN 'N' ELSE A.CS301_FRT END FRT, CASE WHEN A.CS301_CPD = 'A' THEN 'FM' ELSE 'POG' END CPD FROM SAPHEE.ZCST301 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST654 G ON G.MANDT = A.MANDT AND G.CS654_GNO = A.CS301_TEM || A.CS301_RDT || A.CS301_SEQ AND G.CS654_SIR = A.CS301_SIR LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBAP01 H ON H.MANDT = A.MANDT AND H.DOCNO = A.CS301_DOC AND H.DOCKIND = '21', SAPHEE.ZCST302 B, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 C, SAPHEE.ZLCODE D, SAPHEE.ZLCODE E, SAPHEE.ZCST111 F WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.CS301_GBN = '2' AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS301_TEM = B.CS302_TEM AND A.CS301_RDT = B.CS302_RDT AND A.CS301_SEQ = B.CS302_SEQ AND A.CS301_SIR = B.CS302_SIR AND A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.CS301_BSU = C.LGORT AND C.MANDT = D.MANDT AND C.BSU_ARA = D.CODE2 AND D.CODE1 = 'CS115' AND D.LANG = #G_LANG# AND A.MANDT = E.MANDT AND A.CS301_TEM = E.CODE2 AND E.CODE1 = 'VKGRP' AND E.LANG = #G_LANG# AND B.MANDT = F.MANDT AND B.CS302_PJT = F.PJT AND B.CS302_HNO = F.HNO
AND A.CS301_MDT BETWEEN #FDT# AND #TDT#
AND A.CS301_CDT BETWEEN #FDT# AND #TDT#
AND C.BSU_ARA = #ARA#
AND A.CS301_TEM = #TEM#
AND A.CS301_TEM IN (SELECT CODE2 AS CODE FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND LANG = #G_LANG# AND CODE1 = 'VKGRP' AND DTEXT1 = #DPT#)
AND A.CS301_BSU = #BSU#
AND C.BSU_PM = #BPM#
AND A.CS301_DEL = 'N'
AND A.CS301_TEM = SUBSTR(CAST(#ETN# AS VARCHAR(13)),1,3) AND A.CS301_RDT = SUBSTR(CAST(#ETN# AS VARCHAR(13)),4,4) AND A.CS301_SEQ = SUBSTR(CAST(#ETN# AS VARCHAR(13)),8,4)
AND A.CS301_SPT LIKE '%' || #SPT# || '%'
AND A.CS301_PJT = #PJT#
AND A.CS301_PST = #PST#
AND VALUE(H.APSTAT,'') = #BAP#
) A GROUP BY A.TEM, A.RDT, A.SEQ, A.SIR ORDER BY A.TEM, A.RDT, A.SEQ, A.SIR, MAX(A.ARA), MAX(A.BSU), MAX(A.UPN), MAX(A.PJT) WITH UR
